statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.17}+{6.73}\right)}={23.8}\approx{23.8}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.73}\cdot{5.17}={34.7941}\approx{34.8}.
